XXganphrdu:3: evaṃ mayā śrutam ekasmin samaye bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati sma /
XXganphrdu:4: gṛdhrakūṭaparvate mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdham ardhatrayodaśabhir bhikṣuśataiḥ saṃbahulaiś ca bodhisatvair mahāsatvaiḥ /
XXganphrdu:5: tena khalu punaḥ samayena bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam āmantrayate sma //
XXganphrdu:6: yaḥ kaścit kulaputra ānanda imāni gaṇapatihṛdayāni dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati tasya sarvāṇi kāryasiddhāni bhaviṣyanti //
XXganphrdu:8: oṃ gaḥ gaḥ gaḥ gaḥ gaḥ gaḥ gaḥ gaḥ /
XXganphrdu:13: oṃ kaṭa kaṭa maṭa maṭa dara dara vidara vidara hana hana gṛhṇa gṛhṇa dhāva dhāva bhañja bhañja jambha jambha tambha (Gph_11)
XXganphrdu:14: tambha stambha stambha moha moha deha deha dadāpaya dadāpaya dhanasiddhi me prayaccha /
XXganphrdu:19: oṃ gaḥ gaḥ gaḥ gaḥ gaḥ gaḥ gaḥ gaḥ /
XXganphrdu:28: yaḥ kaścit kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bhikṣur vā bhikṣuṇī vā upāsako vā upāsikā vā /
XXganphrdu:29_0: yaḥ kaścit kāryam ālabhate mantrasādhanaṃ vā triratnapūjaṃ vā deśāntaragamanaṃ vā
XXganphrdu:29_1: rājakulagamanaṃ vā antardhānaṃ vā tena buddhabhagavatāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā āryagaṇapatihṛdayaṃ
XXganphrdu:29_2: saptavārānucārayitavyaṃ sarvakāryāṇi tasya sidhyante nātra śaṃsayaḥ /
XXganphrdu:31: dinedine kalpam utthāya sarvasaptavārānucārayitavyaṃ mahāsaubhāge bhaviṣyati /
XXganphrdu:35: na kaścid eva tārapradakṣiṇo 'vatāraṃ lapsyate bhṛṅgo 'vatāraṃ lapsyati na cāsya bodhicittottarāyā bhaviṣyanti /
XXganphrdu:37: idam avocat bhagavān āttamanās te ca bhikṣavas te bodhisatvā mahāsatvāḥ sā ca sarvāvatī parṣat sadevamānuṣāsuragaruḍagandharvaś ca loko bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandann iti //
